intro: DCU Boxing Club is a student-run club that caters for all levels of boxing, from beginners to advanced. We have a strong competitive team that competes in the intervarsity competitions and the Dublin Leagues. We also have a strong social side to the club, with regular nights out and events. We train in the DCU Sports Centre, and have a strong relationship with the DCU Sport staff. We are always looking for new members, so if you are interested in joining, please get in touch!
sponsorFormIntro: If you are interested in sponsoring the club, please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
title: DCU Boxing Club
